original_text: Also, if the people in a city hear a trumpet's sound, they become very afraid. If bad trouble comes to a city, it means that the Lord has sent it.
korean_text: 성읍에서 나팔이 울리는데 백성이 어찌 두려워하지 아니하겠으며 여호와의 행하심이 없는데 재앙이 어찌 성읍에 임하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Also, if the people in a city hear a trumpet's sound
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 만약 도시의 사람들이 나팔 소리를 듣는다면

sentences.original_text: If bad trouble comes to a city
it means that the Lord has sent it
